info.thanks: Jyväsmetro has ended! Thank you for participating! Hope to see you again next year!
info.coming-soon: Coming soon... Follow on Instagram and Telegram to stay on track!
info.secondary-market: Didn't get a ticket or can't use yours? Buy and sell tickets on Ticketless!
info.p1: Read more about partners, afterparty and ticket sales below!
info.follow: Keep up with Jyväsmetro by following us on Instagram and by joining announcement channel on Telegram
info.p2: There will be traditional vibes- and haiku-competition, details will be announced on Instagram on the event day.

what.title: What?
what.p1: The event concept is to visit bars all around of Jyväskylä, from central of Jyväskylä to even neighbouring municipalities.
what.p2: The guides will make sure the atmosphere is top notch and travel comfort is as good as it gets. Since Jyväsmetro is interdisciplinary event, you will also meet students from other associations.

tickets.title: Tickets
tickets.p1: Student associations' sale begins 1.4. for those, who have reserved stock for their members. Check your associations announcement channel for a link to the sale. General sale opens 15.4.
tickets.p2: Elevate your Jyväsmetro experience to the next level by boarding the VIP-line, which includes among other things, a goody bag, buffet and skip-the-line access to the afterparties. VIP-line will be available from 1.4.

afterparty.title: Afterparty
afterparty.p1: This year, the metro's afterparties will take us to Club Escape, where we'll be entertained with live music.
